page.title: 14Conservation in Taverham
page.content: There are many examples of wild plants growing in verges and other uncultivated areas of Taverham, though they are becoming rarer because of building, herbicides etc. Birds and mammals can be seen in open areas and in gardens. The following list is by no means exhaustive. {WILD PLANTS BIRDS AND MAMMALS Red & White Campion Blackbird & Robin Yarrow Milfoil House Martin St. John's Wort Pheasant & Thrush Rosebay Willowherb Partridge & Geese Viper's Bugloss Starling & Cuckoo Common Forget me not Sparrow & Kestrel Corn Chamomile Crow, Wren & Owl Self Heal & Ragwort Hedgehog & Mole Scabious & Buttercup Grey Squirrel Tufted Vetch &Clover Field Mice & Fox Cow Parsley & Mallow Shrew & Vole Convolvulus & Meadow Frogs, Toads & Pea, Wild Mustard. Newts.
